inclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of previously untreated large B-cell Non Hodgkin's, Large Cell
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lymphoma and B-Cell with high grade features.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Primary Mediastinal large B-cell Lymphomas will be also allowed to be included.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with performance status of 0-2 (Zubrod Scale).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum bilirubin <1.5 mg/dl and serum creatinine < 2.0 mg/dl unless due to lymphoma;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absolute neutrophil count (ANC) >1000/mm^3 and platelets >100,000/mm^3 unless due to lymphoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ages 16 - 60 years (due to the fact that CHOP-R is not studied enough in younger patients and is not considered standard of care).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be willing to receive transfusions of blood products.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age adjusted International Prognostic Index Score of 2 or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previous steroids are allowed (if used to relieve some symptoms such as SVC, etc).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy (excluded due to the teratogenicity of the involved chemotherapy agents
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Positive HIV serology because of poor tolerance to this intense chemotherapy regimen
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and presented with symptoms of cholecystitis. A pericardiocentesis was performed and the fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma.
